Chiara + Jaime

Cison di Valmarino

June 20, 2020

Details

Come party with us in the Prosecco valley!

Chiara and Jaime are getting married!!!

The wedding will take place a small Church in Cisón di Valmarino, in the prosecco valley in the countryside of Venice. The ceremony is scheduled at 15.30 in the Chiesa Parrocchiale di Tovena (click for google maps link). After the ceremony there is going to be a reception with food, music and wine! It will be held at Case Marian, a XVII century rural hamlet, very near to the Castelbrando Castle (see the map below) on Saturday, June 20, 2020. The garden of Case Marian itself is a sprawling green space where we can share local wine and food.

We will be outdoors, enjoying the sunny weather, playing games, and eating picnic style. Feel free to wear whatever you will be comfortable in.

In the unlikely case of extreme or inclement weather, please check this webpage for any last-minute adjustments to the wedding schedule.

Traveling to Cisón di Valmarino

We will provide transportation from Mestre ("andata e ritorno"). Just be sure you are on time (we will not wait!). In case you want to arrive by yourself by car, the venue is almost an hour from Venezia.

If you're planning to fly in, the closest airport is Marco Polo International Airport. The airport is about a one hour drive from the venue, in case you want to arrive directly.


Lodging

Sarah and Matt have reserved blocks of rooms at several hotels close to the venue. To reserve a room at the wedding rate, let the hotel know you're interested in the Menzenski-Chao Wedding block when you make your reservation.

  • Quality Inn Lawrence — University Area is the closest hotel to the venue — it's literally thirty feet from the park (an easy walk).

  • Baymont Inn & Suites Lawrence is just across the street from the venue (just a few minutes' walk).

  • Hampton Inn Lawrence is across the street from the north end of the park (it's a big park — fifteen minutes' walk).

There are plenty of other hotels in Lawrence (including downtown), and Kansas City is only a 45 minute drive from the venue, if you'd prefer to stay there.

Répondez s'il vous plaît

Please take one minute to fill in the required information. The deadline to confirm participation is February 1st 2020.
